nodes.text: The Universal D-package was an advanced implant that combined the functionalities of the physical and mental boosting implants. This resulted in the user having their muscular system and neural network of the brain significantly enhanced. The technology of D-package implants had the consequence of rendering them larger and more intrusive than other types. Thus, they tended to have more impressive effects, but could only be used by very healthy individuals.
In the game, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 18 or higher.
